entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 15
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1982-0211 Pūjā, Vaitarna, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 20 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1982.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 31: Updates (Moments of Jos Displays Galleries)

link.title: Photos Post 31: Updates (Moments of Jos Displays Galleries)

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to bring to your attention that the Moments of Joy Displays galleries are up to date. Grouped chronologically, they form 17 galleries of the folder Moments of Joy Displays.
Please keep in mind that, as the CCT database is monthly organized, in due time some of these galleries will be divided into 2 or more galleries.
Please kindly share the news and the folder's link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, February 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, February 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 32 new Photos were uploaded to 3 Pūjas as follows (3 high resolutions and 29 medium resolutions).
(i) 1991-0818 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 2 high resolution and 2 medium resolutions uploaded, link Czech Republic 1991.
(ii) 2000-0507 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Italy 2000.
(iii) 2005-0828 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 27 low resolutions uploaded, link U.S.A. 2005-08.
[Note: the 1991-0818 Photos were added just on 2024-0225.]
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
